siteMetadata.title: rantum.dev
siteMetadata.subtitle: digital dwelling of andrew maury. digital developer @ecomloop in burlingame, ca. san matean nantucketer on a rantum scoot.

frontmatter.title: Encourage socialization
frontmatter.description: Good connections are hard to come by and those opportunities shouldn't be put off for the 'right' time. Make time. Encourage others.

frontmatter.title: Good friction
frontmatter.description: Good friction makes for more memorable and unusual experiences. Digital processes work to eliminate all friction, including the good points.

frontmatter.title: Prioritize people
frontmatter.description: The pandemic has only exacerbated, not caused, these conditions. Use the tools available to connect with most meaningful people in a personal manner.
